III. DESCRIPTION OF FINDINGS & CONCLUSIONS
A. Physical Description of Facility
The building has 2 floors, is 8,000 square feet, and appears to be almost new, with lots
of windows, and plenty of space for everyone housed there. 4,000 feet of the building is
used for the Child Welfare program. There are 2 family visiting rooms with a viewing
area in between the 2 rooms. Employees say that they have all the equipment they
need to do their jobs in an efficient manner.
B. Program Description
Bethany Christian Services of Southwest Michigan operates a foster care program for
children who are court and state wards and have been removed from their
parental/guardian homes due to alleged abuse and neglect. The agency provides
short-term temporary placements, long-term foster care, and substitute care. Bethany
currently has 72 foster homes and 126 children placed in licensed foster homes.
Bethany Christian Services of Southwest Michigan also operates an older/special needs
adoption program. This program provides services to children who become available
for adoption through the Michigan child welfare system.
C. Rule/Statutory Violations
None.
